extendedInfo.description: Nelson Mandela became South Africa's first black president in 1994, following a 20-year anti-apartheid campaign. Watch his biography and read the latest news about him through this application.Nelson Rolihlahla Mandela â A South African anti-apartheid revolutionary and politician â Served as President of South Africa from 1994 to 1999. â Was the first black South African to hold the officeâ The first elected in a fully representative, multiracial election.â His government focused on dismantling the legacy of apartheid through tackling institutionalised racism, poverty and inequality, and fostering racial reconciliation. â Politically an African nationalist â Democratic socialistâ Served as the President of the African National Congress (ANC) from 1991 to 1997. â Internationally, Mandela was the Secretary General of the Non-Aligned Movement from 1998 to 1999.Mobile Application Development by http://www.tbldevelopmentfirm.com
